channel.title: Webclient - Error_game_invalidhost - Incorrect website
channel.description:
When trying to load the runescape client from [url=http://jolt7.runescape.com in an iframe]http://jolt7.runescape.com in an iframe[/url], it redirects the page to [url=http://jolt7.runescape.com./lang/en/aff/runescape/error_game_invalidhost.ws]http://jolt7.runescape.com./lang/en/aff/runescape/error_game_invalidhost.ws[/url] and says: [code]Error_game_invalidhost - Incorrect website.
This game does not appear to be loading from the correct website.
Please make sure you are playing from: http://www.runescape.com
Remember to keep your account secure NEVER enter your password anywhere except runescape.com.[/code]
Anyone know how to fix this?
Example - [url=http://danrox2004.byethost32.com/index.php?page=rsser]http://danrox2004.byethost32.com/index.php?page=rsser[/url]
EDIT: Fixed =)

item.title: Webclient - Error_game_invalidhost - Incorrect website
item.dc:creator: @danrox2004 danrox2004
item.description:
@danrox2004 wrote:

Oops k got it - it was a typo I accidently put a “.” in the url.

Read full topic

[code]Error_game_invalidhost - Incorrect website.

This game does not appear to be loading from the correct website.

Please make sure you are playing from: http://www.runescape.com

Remember to keep your account secure NEVER enter your password anywhere except runescape.com.[/code]

Anyone know how to fix this?

Example - http://danrox2004.byethost32.com/index.php?page=rsser
